# NSSpeechRecognizerDelegate

**Protocol**

A set of optional methods implemented by delegates of [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpeechRecognizer] objects.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol NSSpeechRecognizerDelegate : NSObjectProtocol
```

## Recognizing Commands

- **speechRecognizer(_:didRecognizeCommand:)**: Invoked when the recognition engine has recognized the application command `command`.

## Handling the Recognition of a Spoken Command

- **delegate**: The delegate for the speech recognizer object.

## Inherits From

- NSObjectProtocol
